youtube.title: How Face Transplant Surgery Works: Step-by-Step 3D Animation
youtube.description: Explore the complex world of facial allograft transplantation in this detailed 3D medical animation. We break down the surgical preparation of both donor and recipient, including nerve repair, skeletal fixation, and vascular ligation. Perfect for biology students and medical enthusiasts.
